job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: tinder brings people together with tens of millions of users and a presence in every country on earth our reach is expansive and rapidly growingltbrgtltbrgtthe analytics team powers datainformed decisionmaking at tinder we are looking to add a hardworking creative data scientist to our growing team as a data scientist on analytics you will partner with multiple teams including product marketing engineering and finance to improve our extraordinary platform you will use this comprehensive dataset to develop experiments forecasting models automated reports and various exploratory insights to guide our business decisionsltbrgtltbrgtan effective data scientist at tinder must have a passion and aptitude for turning sophisticated problems into concrete hypotheses that can be answered through thorough data analysis and ab testing they must also be able to disseminate their takeaways and recommendations to a variety of partners within our organization via presentations reports and dashboards in this role your insights will influence both the performance of our business and the experience of our usersltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtresponsibilitiesltbrgtltstronggtltligtbe a leader with a point of view for the organization using data to constantly challenge and reshape our current understanding of customer behavior and business performanceltligtltligtderive and communicate datadriven recommendations regarding both the prioritization of potential productmarketing initiatives and performance of current initiativesltligtltligtdefine and operationalize the detailed tracking of companywide teamspecific and productspecific performance metrics via rollup tables dashboards and automated reportingltligtltligtdesign and analyze experiments to rigorously test a specific hypothesisltligtltligtfind the story in the data and readily share insights across the organizationltbrgtltbrgtltligtltstronggtskills requiredltbrgtltstronggtltligtno formal industry experience is required we are looking for creative tenacious problem solvers who are passionate about our product and excited to work with our rich complex datasetltligtltligtability to develop a nuanced business understanding testable hypotheses and meaningful findings from dataltligtltligteagerness to identify and explore new productmarketing opportunities potential improvements to our data infrastructure and unanswered questions about customer behaviorltligtltligtoutstanding written and verbal communication skills and a willingness to collaborate with business partnersltligtltligtcomfort using descriptive and inferential statisticsltligtltligtexperience with sql and data visualization tools eg tableau or mode is highly recommendedltligtltligtfamiliarity with scripting languages machine learning advanced statistical techniques and ab testing is a plusltbrgtltbrgtltligtltstronggtas part of our team youll enjoyltbrgtltstronggtltligt working on a product that has an immediate impact on peoples lives all around the worldltligtltligt collaborating with a team of creative fun and driven colleaguesltligtltligt comprehensive health coverage competitive salary k employer match employee stock purchase plan esppltligtltligt other perks and wellness benefits like a fitness membership subsidy paid concierge medical membership pet insurance offerings and a commuter subsidyltligtltligt a robust learning development offering including our mentormatch program access to a library of online learning courses through udemy and an annual ld stipendltligtltligt access to mental health resourcesltligtltligt fertility preservation benefitsltligtltligt no meeting wednesdays and access to a wide range of product and service discounts through perkspotltligtltligt charitable donations match up to annuallyltligtltligt monthly and weekly interactive virtual events including book club trivia with prizes and yoga workoutsltligtltligt the opportunity to join six active employee resource groups ergsltbrgtltbrgtltligtat tinder we dont just accept difference we celebrate it we support it and we thrive on it for the benefit of our employees our product and our community we strive to make our workplace an inclusive and diverse environment giving people from all walks of life the opportunity to have a voice we champion and encourage those who bring different perspectives ideas and creativity to join our team dedicated to bringing people together across the globe tinder is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace where we welcome all people regardless of sex gender identity race ethnicity disability or other lived experience
